K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-031:472a-0: @472a / /'phags @472b pa 'jam dpal gyi sngags yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i cho ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-031:472a-3: gsang sngags yi ge 'bru gcig pa 'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-031:472a-4: don thams cad sgrub par byed pa; las thams cad byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-031:472a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-031:472a-6: re ba thams cad yongs su skong bar mdzad pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-031:472a-7: so shing la sngags nas bcangs na so na ba 'byang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-031:472a-8: mig na ba la rgya ma tshva btags pa la lan bdun sngags te mig bkang na mig nad sel to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-031:472a-9: mi'i khong du mtshon gyi dum bu lus pa la zhun mar rnying pa la lan bdun nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-031:472a-10: brgya rtsa brgyad sngags ste blud pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-031:472a-11: rma khar bskus na mtshon gyis dum bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-031:472a-14: tshad pas 'khru ba la mu rang tshva'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-031:472a-16: yang na lan tshva gzhan gang yang rung ba la lan bdun sngags te zos na nad de las grol te de nyid kyi nyin par sos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-031:472a-17: klad pa na pa la bya rog gi sgro la lan bdun sngags te byabs nas nang de sos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-031:472a-18: 'jam dpal gyi yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
